goal: I want to track a specific property at 8017 Valley Rd, Dallas, TX 75266. On Zilloft, find its last sale date. Then, create an all-day event on my GoCalendar for that same date but for next year, titled 'Review Property Value: 1800 Pearl' to remind me to check its appreciation.

evals.description: Verify that the last sale date for the property at 8017 Valley Rd, Dallas, TX 75266 was successfully extracted by Zilloft. (Assuming zilloft.finalstate.extractedData.lastSaleDate is the path for this information)
Verify that exactly one event was added to GoCalendar.
Verify the title of the created GoCalendar event is 'Review Property Value: 1800 Pearl'.
Verify the GoCalendar event is an all-day event and its date is set to the last sale date (from Zilloft) but for next year.
